DataElement.preferredName: Person Corrective Lens Use Assessment Description Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being._A lens generally worn in front of the eye, mainly used to treat myopia, hyperopia, astigmatism, and presbyopia.  This includes glasses, contact lenses, and intraocular implanted lenses._Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something._The words of something written.

Concepts.definition: A lens generally worn in front of the eye, mainly used to treat myopia, hyperopia, astigmatism, and presbyopia. This includes glasses, contact lenses, and intraocular implanted lenses.
A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.
